name.value: Rad Zone Totality: Exhibition Centre Expansion

item.description:
This is the second expansion of Rad Zone Totality and is designed to be used in conjunction with the core rules. It includes the search matrix for the Exhibition Centre and the building map. All the search matrix references for the map are found below, so this is a totally new location and map for your survivors.

The Exhibition Centre (EXC) search matrices are listed first. Search modifiers do not apply to all tables in the matrix: guidance is provided in the title of the table. Some of the tables are designed to increase the random nature of searching so may point you to another table. At the back of the book are the maps. Because this is a digital product these pages can be printed individually.

UkGamesExpo

This Rad Zone Totality expansion was released to coincide with our first appearance at the 2023 UKGamesExpo in Birmingham, England. It has been designed in homage to this awesome event, although the map provided here is nowhere near the size and scale of the NEC.
Situation

On the outskirts of the industrial sector of the city, you have discovered a large building with a sign at the front reading “Exhibition Centre”. There is a rumour that this place was once used as a base for a small bandit group, but they joined the Quarantine Denizen and haven’t been seen since. You suspect there could be useful loot inside, including Equipment and Raw Materials. There is a huge sun symbol, with a V in the centre, painted on the outside (the symbol of the Quarantine Denizen) and you wonder if this has put off potential looters. You might be in luck today!

You may now select the Exhibition Centre when out on a mission! Refer to the tables in this expansion when exploring the building.

—description from the designer
